amendment.purpose: An amendment to the Smith amendment to strike the bill's definition of "allotment"; strike the bill's definition of "base property"; and to strike the paragraph relating to treatment of leasing or subleasing of base property.

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Stenholm to the Smith (OR) amendment (A001).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stenholm amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
